attributes.action: concentrate on the NHS service, and in particular allow patients to see their doctor the same day they ring for an appointment, rather than having to visit days later or be given pescriptions over the phone.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I also request that more emergency dentists be open, and more NHS dentists available. It is important that when you need emergency treatment by doctors or dentists it is available when you need it, rather than having to wait for treatment that may not be necessary when you are finally given an appointment. Thank you.
